channel.title: Game crashes during in-game loading
channel.description:
Hey everyone. Non-native speaker here so forgive my english.
I bought the game today but seem to crash everytime I enter a loading phase. The game just freezes and the audio loops. Can't get out, even with the task manager.
I already tried : - Updating drivers - Reinstalling the game - Playing in borderless window mode - Lauching using -autoconfig
Any idea ? Here are my specs :
AMD Ryzen 7 3700X 8-Core Processor
AMD Radeon RX 5700 XT
16 GB RAM
Windows 10
Thanks a lot!

item.dc:creator: RedEye
item.description:
Restart your computer before doing any of the following. Also when troubleshooting crashes and other problems: Uninstall ALL mods, no exceptions.

Revert to the old menu.
Right-click the game in Steam, select “Properties”, and in the General tab select “Set Launch Options”. Type “-oldgameui” in the launch config.
